Course Overview: Professional training program to equip individuals with the knowledge and skills to guide tourists.
Eligibility Criteria: High school diploma or equivalent qualification, excellent communication and interpersonal skills, knowledge of local history and culture.
Duration & Structure: Varies between institutions, typically 6 months to 1 year, covering subjects like tourism management, cultural heritage, communication skills.
Top Institutions: Institute of Tourism and Travel Management, Gwalior
Indian Institute of Tourism and Travel Management, New Delhi
Welcome Institute of Hotel Management, Manipal
Future Scope in India: Growing tourism industry with increasing demand for qualified tour guides, especially in emerging destinations.
Further Study Options: Bachelor's Degree in Tourism and Hospitality
